pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a school courtyard with a basketball court. The camera slowly pans upward, revealing the large, red brick building that surrounds the area. Students in uniform are present throughout the courtyard.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a scenery shot of a school courtyard with a basketball court. The camera slowly pans upward, revealing the large, red brick building that surrounds the area. Students in uniform are present throughout the courtyard.
initial_feedback:
The camera slowly tilts upward rather than "pans"
